column5: I live in Orangeville Ont. and only have about 5 hours of fishing time available on Sun morning. Which leaves me around 1 hour each way for driving. Id like to hook into some steelhead on the fly but they still probably havent had a solid run yet in either Lake O or Huron tribs, salmon will be more likely. I was thinking Erindale park or maybe somewhere on the Notty. Any opinion from recent experience is great!!!
we got 3 nice steelies the other day....my buddy got one bout 8 pounds and the smallest around 4.....pm me and ill tell you where.....
